description: You like toys & head?! Then this recent submission is for you. Did I mention a nice facial at the end?! So-these college roommates used to mess around, right?! But the guy using the toy, who professed not swallowing, was caught by his roommate taking another dudes load, leaving this guy only giving him a face full of cum! Now the video is online and the once: "I don't swallow dude," is left with more than a load on his face. Sucks to be a hypocrite, right?! Enjoy this lying dude's misery! He deserves it!!!
title: A Helping Hand
